title: petsc and zlib linking problem (strange import/linking problem with python + petsc4py + matplotlib)
body:
using spack compiled python+petsc4py+matplotlib:
```
hron@r0d0$ spack find python py-petsc4py py-matplotlib petsc

-- linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64 / gcc@7.4.0 -------------------------
petsc@3.8.4  py-matplotlib@3.0.0  py-petsc4py@3.8.1  python@3.6.5
```
I see a strange error in linking:

- working order of imports
```
hron@r0d0$ python
Python 3.6.5 (default, Feb  9 2019, 12:35:34) 
[GCC 7.4.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import sys
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> import petsc4py
>>> petsc4py.init(sys.argv)
>>> 
```

- non-working order
```
hron@r0d0$ python
Python 3.6.5 (default, Feb  9 2019, 12:35:34) 
[GCC 7.4.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import sys
>>> import petsc4py
>>> petsc4py.init(sys.argv)
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/py-matplotlib/3.0.0/56bf2zhzyqlj2lpa/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/pyplot.py", line 32, in <module>
    import matplotlib.colorbar
  File "/usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/py-matplotlib/3.0.0/56bf2zhzyqlj2lpa/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/colorbar.py", line 32, in <module>
    import matplotlib.contour as contour
  File "/usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/py-matplotlib/3.0.0/56bf2zhzyqlj2lpa/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/contour.py", line 18, in <module>
    import matplotlib.font_manager as font_manager
  File "/usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/py-matplotlib/3.0.0/56bf2zhzyqlj2lpa/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/font_manager.py", line 48, in <module>
    from matplotlib import afm, cbook, ft2font, rcParams, get_cachedir
ImportError: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libz.so.1: version `ZLIB_1.2.9' not found (required by /usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/libpng/1.6.34/uzwwmyb42qhkd7jr/lib/libpng16.so.16)
```

checking the import error - that zlib rquired by libpng16.so.16 is not found - the linking seems to be ok?
```
hron@r0d0$ ldd /usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/libpng/1.6.34/uzwwmyb42qhkd7jr/lib/libpng16.so.16
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007f9819e3b000)
	libz.so.1 => /usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/zlib/1.2.11/2oxindpgtak27aeq/lib/libz.so.1 (0x00007f98197d0000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f98194c7000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f98190fd000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007f9819c18000)
hron@r0d0$ ldd /usr/local/pkg/Installs/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64-gcc7.4.0/zlib/1.2.11/2oxindpgtak27aeq/lib/libz.so.1
        linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007f8af5723000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f8af4f20000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007f8af5500000)
```

Since i don't see which part is doing something wrong - spack/python/petsc4py/matplotlib - my first try is to ask here firs if anyone have seen this problem? Or if anyone has idea how to check whats is wrong here...
